quote: Smile in the mirror. Do that every morning and you'll start to see a big difference in your life.
name: Yoko Ono

quote: Some people dream of success, while other people get up every morning and make it happen.
name: Wayne Huizenga

quote: Prayer is the key of the morning and the bolt of the evening.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: There was never a night or a problem that could defeat sunrise or hope.
name: Bernard Williams

quote: My children are the reason I laugh, smile and want to get up every morning.
name: Gena Lee Nolin

quote: Opportunities are like sunrises. If you wait too long, you miss them.
name: William Arthur Ward

quote: Every day I feel is a blessing from God. And I consider it a new beginning. Yeah, everything is beautiful.
name: Prince

quote: When I wake up every morning, I thank God for the new day.
name: F. Sionil Jose

quote: I may be drunk, Miss, but in the morning I will be sober and you will still be ugly.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: An early-morning walk is a blessing for the whole day.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Think in the morning. Act in the noon. Eat in the evening. Sleep in the night.
name: William Blake

quote: If you're going to do something tonight that you'll be sorry for tomorrow morning, sleep late.
name: Henny Youngman

quote: Morning without you is a dwindled dawn.
name: Emily Dickinson

quote: A muscle is like a car. If you want it to run well early in the morning, you have to warm it up.
name: Florence Griffith Joyner

quote: Nothing is more beautiful than the loveliness of the woods before sunrise.
name: George Washington Carver

quote: Freedom itself was attacked this morning by a faceless coward, and freedom will be defended.
name: George W. Bush

quote: Autumn arrives in early morning, but spring at the close of a winter day.
name: Elizabeth Bowen

quote: God's mercy is fresh and new every morning.
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: I just enjoy life now. I just enjoy every morning I get to wake up.
name: Nas

quote: On Sunday morning, I'm not nervous... I can't wait to tell what God wants me to say.
name: Charles Stanley

quote: You've got to get up every morning with determination if you're going to go to bed with satisfaction.
name: George Horace Lorimer

quote: Be pleasant until ten o'clock in the morning and the rest of the day will take care of itself.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: True terror is to wake up one morning and discover that your high school class is running the country.
name: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: The two most joyous times of the year are Christmas morning and the end of school.
name: Alice Cooper

quote: Every morning I wake up and thank God.
name: Aaron Neville

quote: There is nothing quite like a freshly brewed pot of tea to get you going in the morning.
name: Phyllis Logan

quote: It is a matter of shame that in the morning the birds should be awake earlier than you.
name: Abu Bakr

quote: No matter how bad things are, you can at least be happy that you woke up this morning.
name: D. L. Hughley

quote: Human life is as evanescent as the morning dew or a flash of lightning.
name: Samuel Butler

quote: Early morning cheerfulness can be extremely obnoxious.
name: William Feather

quote: I wake up every morning literally with a smile on my face, grateful for another day I never thought I'd see.
name: Dick Cheney

quote: A bachelor is a man who comes to work each morning from a different direction.
name: Sholom Aleichem

quote: The sun is new each day.
name: Heraclitus

quote: My perfect morning is spent drinking coffee, eating porridge and reading the paper at a local cafe.
name: Anton du Beke

quote: I love to start the morning with a mist spray, especially after a night out.
name: Lily James

quote: I get up in the morning looking for an adventure.
name: George Foreman

quote: To simply wake up every morning a better person than when I went to bed.
name: Sidney Poitier

quote: Morning comes whether you set the alarm or not.
name: Ursula K. Le Guin

quote: Remember that creating a successful marriage is like farming: you have to start over again every morning.
name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: I don't know why you call it morning sickness, because I was sick all day and night!
name: Soleil Moon Frye

quote: Don't let the Monday morning quarterbacks stop you from being bold. You've got to set a high bar.
name: Antonio Villaraigosa

quote: The person who doesn't scatter the morning dew will not comb gray hairs.
name: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: One morning I shot an elephant in my pajamas. How he got into my pajamas I'll never know.
name: Groucho Marx

quote: Do and act on what you believe to be right, and you'll wake up the next morning feeling good about yourself.
name: Janet Reno

quote: Even if you don't have time for a big workout, stretching in the morning and night really changes your body.
name: Erin Heatherton

quote: You don't learn style from watching people on a runway. Fashion happens every morning when you wake up.
name: Shalom Harlow

quote: It ain't as bad as you think. It will look better in the morning.
name: Colin Powell

quote: Sometimes, I sit down to sketch at the unearthly hour of 3 in the morning!
name: Nafisa Joseph

quote: I'm obsessed with radio. It's a good start to Sunday morning.
name: R. L. Stine

quote: I recently took up ice sculpting. Last night I made an ice cube. This morning I made 12, I was prolific.
name: Mitch Hedberg

quote: Every day, I wake up and say, 'Good Morning, Jesus.'
name: Vanity

quote: There's nothing sadder in this world than to awake Christmas morning and not be a child.
name: Erma Bombeck

quote: A good idea will keep you awake during the morning, but a great idea will keep you awake during the night.
name: Marilyn vos Savant

quote: Couldn't start the morning without caffeine.
name: Ginnifer Goodwin

quote: When you walk out of your house in the morning, you don't know what you're going to see.
name: Kyle Chandler

quote: We could hardly wait to get up in the morning.
name: Wilbur Wright

quote: It was a splendid summer morning and it seemed as if nothing could go wrong.
name: John Cheever

quote: I'm a very early riser, and I don't like to miss that beautiful early morning light.
name: David Hockney

quote: What is love? It is the morning and the evening star.
name: Sinclair Lewis

quote: Cinema in India is like brushing your teeth in the morning. You can't escape it.
name: Shah Rukh Khan

quote: My only personal time is a couple of hours in the gym in the morning.
name: Aaron Schock

quote: Each morning when I awake, I experience again a supreme pleasure - that of being Salvador Dali.
name: Salvador Dali

quote: Good morning is a contradiction of terms.
name: Jim Davis

quote: My mother had morning sickness after I was born.
name: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: This morning when I put on my underwear I could hear the fruit-of-the-loom guys laughing at me.
name: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: I try to start drinking water as soon as my feet hit the floor in the morning.
name: Mary Kay Andrews

quote: Everybody says 'Good Morning' in Harlem because it's true! And that's lovely.
name: Marcia Gay Harden

quote: A lot of vets like 'Good Morning Vietnam' - I get great letters from guys.
name: Robin Williams

quote: Drink warm water with lemon first thing in the morning. It's a good way to detox and alkalize your body.
name: Valentina Zelyaeva

quote: A good husband is never the first to go to sleep at night or the last to awake in the morning.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: I think glamour all the time. I wake up in the morning and I'm already thinking glamour.
name: Donatella Versace

quote: Tell him he can have my title, but I want it back in the morning.
name: Jack Dempsey

quote: I'm going to marry a Jewish woman because I like the idea of getting up Sunday morning and going to the deli.
name: Michael J. Fox

quote: Send a bouquet of your face with the morning breeze.
name: Hafez

quote: Saturday morning, you knew what was cool by what was on 'Soul Train.'
name: Nick Cannon

quote: I'm definitely a morning person. I wake up dead happy, looking forward to having my cereal!
name: Nico Mirallegro

quote: I'm always afraid of failing. I have to quiet that fear if I'm going to get up in the morning.
name: Taylor Swift

quote: I go jogging for 25 minutes every morning, even if I'm away from home.
name: Pierre Dukan

quote: You feel a little older in the morning. By noon I feel about 55.
name: Bob Dole

quote: I had a monumental idea this morning, but I didn't like it.
name: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: I make a huge batch of cinnamon buns on Christmas Eve and bake them off early Christmas morning.
name: Christina Tosi

quote: My ideal is to wake up in the morning and run around the meadow naked.
name: Daryl Hannah

quote: On a beautiful clear Sunday morning, myself and James Nesbitt jumped out of a plane together at 18,000 feet.
name: Aidan Turner

quote: Some mornings, it's just not worth chewing through the leather straps.
name: Emo Philips

quote: If have to undergo preschool safety checks every morning, why does a random thug get to own an assault rifle?
name: Christine Pelosi

quote: In the morning a man walks with his whole body; in the evening, only with his legs.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: When I woke up this morning my girlfriend asked me, 'Did you sleep good?' I said 'No, I made a few mistakes.'
name: Steven Wright

quote: I look upon death to be as necessary to our constitution as sleep. We shall rise refreshed in the morning.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: All men are children, and of one family. The same tale sends them all to bed, and wakes them in the morning.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I have a great deal of company in the house, especially in the morning when nobody calls.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: In my afternoon walk I would fain forget all my morning occupations and my obligations to society.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I do the 'New York Times' crossword puzzle every morning to keep the old grey matter ticking.
name: Carol Burnett

quote: I rely on breakfast to give me a kickstart of energy in the morning, so I choose my foods accordingly.
name: Mikaela Shiffrin

quote: Every night when I go to bed, I hope that I may never wake again, and every morning renews my grief.
name: Franz Schubert

quote: Tomorrow morning before we depart, I intend to land and see what can be found in the neighborhood.
name: Christopher Columbus

quote: In a real dark night of the soul, it is always three o'clock in the morning, day after day.
name: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: I love coffee because it's the ritual of my morning. I'm very much a morning person.
name: Ryan Hurd

quote: It can take me forever to choose the right coffee cup in the morning. And it does make a difference!
name: Joel Grey

quote: I have two bowls of confidence for breakfast each morning.
name: Eric Bristow

quote: I'm never any good in the morning. It is only after four in the afternoon that I get going.
name: Stephen Hawking

quote: No man knows till he has suffered from the night how sweet and dear to his heart and eye the morning can be.
name: Bram Stoker

quote: You have to have a dream so you can get up in the morning.
name: Billy Wilder

quote: One is a painter because one wants so-called freedom; one doesn't want to go to the office every morning.
name: Marcel Duchamp

quote: Having children is fab. They keep me young and make me get up in the morning.
name: Jo Brand

quote: Sunday morning church service is not an enormous priority; spending time with other believers is.
name: Donald Miller

quote: Nixon was so crooked that he needed servants to help him screw his pants on every morning.
name: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: I put on lip balm first thing in the morning and always use it before I swipe on my red lipstick.
name: Heather Morris

quote: Everybody's after a new morning. What do we have to run up and salute tomorrow?
name: Robert Stone

quote: The happiest part of a man's life is what he passes lying awake in bed in the morning.
name: Samuel Johnson

quote: If you're changing the world, you're working on important things. You're excited to get up in the morning.
name: Larry Page

quote: You have to know why you get up every morning.
name: Dan Buettner

quote: When I wake up in the morning, I feel just like any other insecure 24-year-old girl.
name: Lady Gaga

quote: I am putting every effort toward creating my works from morning till night on every single day.
name: Yayoi Kusama

quote: I have my Lucky Charms in the morning, and I feel magical.
name: Tracy Morgan

quote: When traveling with someone, take large does of patience and tolerance with your morning coffee.
name: Helen Hayes

quote: I don't know who made the Earth. I woke up one morning, and it's here. I make the best of it.
name: Ed Asner

quote: There's nothing like not washing your teeth or washing your face or brushing your teeth in the morning.
name: Sissy Spacek

quote: I used to wake up in the morning and say, 'Oh, God.' Now I wake up in the morning and look forward to life.
name: Steven Adler

quote: I work to Glenn Gould in the morning and go to sleep listening to Parsifal.
name: Patti Smith

quote: I like to start my day after noon. I'm not a morning person at all!
name: Sara Sampaio

quote: If you can't get up in the morning and laugh at yourself, don't get out of bed.
name: Chris Collins

quote: We had cocktail parties and I'd stay up until 5 in the morning.
name: Dorothy Malone

quote: In these times you have to be an optimist to open your eyes when you awake in the morning.
name: Carl Sandburg

quote: I want to get so famous that I don't have to wake up in the morning. It'll probably never happen.
name: Gabriel Iglesias

quote: As far as I'm concerned, the entire reason for becoming a writer is not having to get up in the morning.
name: Neil Gaiman

quote: I woke up this morning, and I still don't believe I won the Daytona 500.
name: Dale Earnhardt

quote: I am a New Yorker, and 7:00 A.M. is a civilized hour to finish the day, not to start it.
name: Sonia Sotomayor

quote: I don't have to wait until the next morning to regret something I did that was kinda dumb.
name: Bobby Knight

quote: O sweet, delusive Noon, Which the morning climbs to find, O moment sped too soon, And morning left behind.
name: Helen Hunt Jackson

quote: We awoke one morning in September, and the world lurched on its axis.
name: Jeb Bush

quote: I do not ask for the riches that perish or the fame that fades away like a morning mist.
name: Mother Angelica

quote: The most important thing for me is health - you wake up in the morning, you can breathe, and you can walk.
name: Mohamed Al-Fayed

quote: I am not a morning person. I like to sleep in.
name: Martha Plimpton

quote: I spent many a summer early morning with the radio very low, half sleeping and half listening.
name: Frankie Valli

quote: Maxi dresses are also my best friend. They take me from my morning coffee, to the beach, to nighttime.
name: Hilary Rhoda

quote: This morning's scene is good and fine, Long rain has not harmed the land.
name: Du Fu

quote: For me, a stay at the Uma Paro with Pilates every morning is a perfect escape.
name: Ben Elliot

quote: Sometimes I miss out the morning's painting session and instead study my Japanese books in the open.
name: Gustav Klimt

quote: If there was no Black Sabbath, I could still possibly be a morning newspaper delivery boy. No fun.
name: Lars Ulrich

quote: With Saturday morning cartoons, you've got to start at 6 A.M., right?
name: Jim Rash

quote: I like to get up at six in the morning, and I draw until sometimes ten at night.
name: Bill Plympton

quote: You can't set a hen in one morning and have chicken salad for lunch.
name: George M. Humphrey

quote: I'd wake up in the morning and I would think, 'Where am I?' I'd have to gather myself.
name: Pat Summitt

quote: I wake up in the morning thinking about food.
name: Guy Fieri

quote: I'm hugely self-critical in the morning.
name: Nick Cave

quote: What inspires you, what excites you when you wake up in the morning?
name: Jennifer Aniston

quote: When I wake up at 5 in the morning is it just to jog? Definitely not, I give it all of my efforts.
name: Haile Gebrselassie

quote: Our families should gather for family prayer morning and night.
name: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: I love such mirth as does not make friends ashamed to look upon one another next morning.
name: Izaak Walton

quote: Every NASCAR driver watches Formula One in the morning; they are well informed.
name: Mario Andretti

quote: I have oatmeal every morning with whole milk, bananas, and cinnamon, and it's just the best thing ever.
name: Kourtney Kardashian

quote: In the morning and the end of every day, I thank that I'm alive.
name: Nobu Matsuhisa

quote: In the morning, my alarm clock is a chorus of lemurs yelling!
name: Bindi Irwin

quote: I go to the gym at five in the morning and then go do a hike.
name: RuPaul

quote: The idea is to go to bed every night with fewer enemies than you had in the morning.
name: David Petraeus

quote: I get up every morning early, when the sky is red, and write for 10 hours.
name: Isabel Allende

quote: If it's the morning, and I had a late night, the worst thing in the world is a bright light.
name: Stone Cold Steve Austin

quote: I did 'Good Morning America' with David Beckham. Oh, god, what a handsome devil that guy is.
name: Geoff Stults

quote: It seems a long time since the morning mail could be called correspondence.
name: Jacques Barzun

quote: You should wake up in the morning and say, 'What do I want to do today? What's going to make me happy?'
name: Payal Kadakia

quote: Swallow a toad in the morning and you will encounter nothing more disgusting the rest of the day.
name: Nicolas Chamfort

quote: I have to have coffee in the morning.
name: Olivia Culpo

quote: Morning meditation is important to start every day on a positive note.
name: Susan Burton

quote: 'Good Morning America' is television to a fare-thee-well.
name: Frank Deford

quote: Early this morning, I signed my death warrant.
name: Michael Collins

quote: I drink iced coffee nearly every morning and many afternoons year-round.
name: Josh Gondelman

quote: Lose an hour in the morning, and you will spend all day looking for it.
name: Richard Whately

quote: Most of the time I spend when I get up in the morning is trying to figure out what is going to happen.
name: Madeleine Albright

quote: It's such a luxury to be able to be happy about going to work in the morning.
name: Joe Pantoliano

quote: I don't always take off my make-up before bed, and I like pizza at two in the morning.
name: Katie Holmes

quote: When you have to get into the character each morning, give it your voice, your face, it was torture.
name: Victoria Abril

quote: This morning someone sent me a very funny photo of me holding their puppy. We have matching colour jackets.
name: Luke Treadaway

quote: I used to spend every morning in detention at my old school.
name: Jake Lloyd

quote: Change is tough, people don't like it, but it is necessary. Take two aspirins and call me in the morning.
name: Christopher Bond

quote: By Thursday morning, we'd gotten over the worst of it.
name: William Scranton

quote: I wake up every morning feeling like I have the best life.
name: Danny Wood

quote: This enraged the other Nazi so much that the next morning he came to our house and he shot my father.
name: Bruno Schulz

quote: First thing every morning before you arise say out loud, 'I believe,' three times.
name: Ovid

quote: How like herrings and onions our vices are in the morning after we have committed them.
name: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: I never knew a man come to greatness or eminence who lay abed late in the morning.
name: Jonathan Swift

quote: I pray every night before I go to sleep and every morning when I wake up.
name: Demi Lovato

quote: In the morning, I always use a cube of ice on my face - it gives me a natural lift.
name: Irina Shayk

quote: I get up 5:30-6 every morning. I'm in the gym. I run a couple miles.
name: Magic Johnson

quote: I see myself at 7:30 in the morning and it's not too pretty.
name: Rod Stewart

quote: I wake up every morning with the worst anxiety. I don't know why. I have, like, a problem.
name: Kylie Jenner

quote: I get up in the morning, have a job to do, go there, come home, be with the family, that's it.
name: Amitabh Bachchan

quote: Morning is the best time to see movies.
name: Christopher Walken

quote: She got the magazine on a Wednesday morning, and on Thursday announced our marriage was over.
name: David Gest

quote: The less I behave like Whistler's mother the night before, the more I look like her the morning after.
name: Tallulah Bankhead

quote: On game days, I do yoga as just a really short routine. It's more to warm up and to calm down in the morning.
name: Christen Press

quote: Every day is morning in Trump's America!
name: Ann Coulter

quote: Do you know that I was the anchor on the 'CBS Morning Show?' And my newsman was Walter Cronkite.
name: Dick Van Dyke

quote: Every morning I have something to do, I'm better off. It's bad to get up and not have something to do.
name: Dick Van Dyke

quote: And if I had a preference, it would be to be able to not be in the studio until 4 in the morning.
name: Alanis Morissette

quote: I wake up laughing. Yes, I wake up in the morning and there I am just laughing my head off.
name: Bruce Willis

quote: Always get married in the morning. That way if it doesn't work out, you haven't wasted the whole day.
name: Mickey Rooney

quote: Success, for me, is being able to wake up in the morning and feel like a 12 year old.
name: John McAfee

quote: When I wake up in the morning, I feel like a billionaire without paying taxes.
name: Ernie Banks

quote: What's the first thing I do when I wake up in the morning? Wish I hadn't.
name: Morrissey

quote: I get up at the same time every morning.
name: Mehmet Oz

quote: I love the smell of juice boxes in the morning.
name: Robert Duvall

quote: I spend almost every morning with mail.
name: Seamus Heaney

quote: It's always such a joy that you wake up in the morning and there's work to do.
name: Jerome Lawrence

quote: If I want to get work done, that's usually about 3 in the morning.
name: Marc Andreessen

quote: It's a job. I entertain my readers. I get up in the morning, and I start typing.
name: Clive Cussler

quote: I'm not a morning person, and yet production is a morning person's game.
name: Julie Plec

quote: Every morning you get up, risk starts.
name: Joe Kaeser

quote: You're not always going to look super glamorous in the morning when you wake up. Everything's not perfect.
name: Emma Kenney

quote: I always wake up early Saturday morning, and I have a little bit more time, so I go to the gym.
name: Ehud Olmert

quote: Sometimes in the morning, when it's a good surf, I go out there, and I don't feel like it's a bad world.
name: Kary Mullis

quote: It is not time for mirth and laughter, the cold, gray dawn of the morning after.
name: George Ade

quote: The sound of the blades on the ice in the morning is like smelling fresh coffee.
name: Tara Lipinski

quote: It's great to be working. Every morning, I wake up and pinch myself.
name: Helen Craig
